string.text: Alpha Order: find the three necessary circuitry

Monolitovsky mechanic Alf has asked you to find all the information on working with mechanical devices that could stay in the old CCD Pripyat. According to his data is the result of long dead during the second explosion scientists. Total should be three documents.
Alpha Order: find the remaining two schemes
One of the three old patterns found, look for the other two.
Alpha Order: find the remaining two schemes
One of the three old patterns found, look for the other two.
Alpha Order: find the remaining two schemes
One of the three old patterns found, look for the other two.
Alpha order: get one remaining scheme
Two of the three old patterns are found, look for the remaining one.
Alpha order: get one remaining scheme
Two of the three old patterns are found, look for the remaining one.
Alpha order: get one remaining scheme
Two of the three old patterns are found, look for the remaining one.
Alpha order: First collect the information found customer
Take Alpha are all found in the CCD documents.
Item 62: find documents in the testing workshop
It is necessary to find product documentation ¹62. The documentation should be clear - could it be the cause of these weapons falling helicopters.
Unidentified weapon: take cover in the building
You must take cover in the building and repel the Monolith attack.
Unidentified weapon: find information
Weapons malfunction, but the principle of its action is unknown. Need to find a technician who would understand this strange weapon.
Unidentified weapon: kill the Monolith squad leader
You must kill the Monolith squad leader, the one using the unidentified weapon.
Unidentified weapon: search the dead Monolith fighters
The Monolith fighters should have the unidentified weapon with them - find it.
Unidentified weapon: talk to Cardan
Cardan should have shaken off his hangover by now - time to talk to him about the unidentified weapon.
Unknown Weapon: wait until Cardan wakes up
It seems Cardan knows something about these weapons. I'll have to talk to him when he ave.
Gauss rifle: tell Kovalsky about the weapon
Colonel Kowalski need to present all information received about the product ¹62.
Unidentified weapon: join the squad
You need to join the special squad in order to capture the weapon together.
Unidentified weapon: pick up the weapon
You need to pick up the Monolith squad leader's weapon.
Unidentified weapon: take the weapon to Kovalsky
Weapons obtained, should now show it Kowalski and find out whether it is the cause of the fall of helicopters.
Unidentified weapon: take part in the Monolith ambush
The military recon unit is setting up an ambush to attack the Monolith squad. You should take part in the operation.
Monolith forces: meet with the reinforcements
Kovalsky has sent reinforcements to help you eliminate the Monolith squad holed up in the book store.
Monolith forces: clear out the book store
You need to eliminate all Monolith forces in the building. Large Monolith units are a danger to the military camp.
Monolith forces: investigate the strange construction
Inside the building, which had been 'Monolith', found a strange design. It is necessary to examine this structure.
Laboratory X8: find documents concerning experiments
The information you found refers to a central laboratory, designated X8. It could contain information about secret experiments conducted in the Zone.
Missing recon unit: find the squad
Scouts sent Kowalski, disappeared after a strange conversation. Need to find them, and find out what happened.
Missing sentry: investigate the area where the sentry died
All behaved very strangely, you need to look around and find the reason for the strange behavior.
Missing sentry: find the sentry
One of the soldiers disappeared from his post, you need to find him and find out the cause of extinction.
Missing sentry: kill the controller
Next to the clock there is a missing controller, you must destroy the mutant.
Radio interference: find the missing squad
Detachment seek sources of interference gone, you need to find it.
Radio interference: search the bodies
Need to examine the body, maybe it will help determine the cause of their death.
Radio interference: search the body
It is necessary to examine the body, maybe it will help determine the cause of his death.
Radio interference: blow up the door
To enter the building, you need to lay explosives, and clear the passage.
Radio interference: investigate the sound
Heard a knock from the refrigerator, it seems someone was inside locked. It is necessary to check the source of the sound.
Radio interference: eliminate the source of interference
Source interference is detected, it is necessary to destroy it.
Radio interference: find the source of interference
Somewhere in the building there is a source of interference, you need to find it.
Radio interference: find the explosives
We look for sources of interference detachment, was explosive. We need to find her, to clear the entrance to the building.
Radio interference: get inside the kindergarten building
The signal source is somewhere in the building of kindergarten, it is necessary to get there.
Evacuation: cover the military
Strelok may be dead, but you still have to help the military get to the helicopters.
Evacuation: cover Strelok
Command interested Known arrow. The arrow must be delivered to the helicopters.
Evacuation: get to the helicopters
The entire team was killed, and now you need to get to the helicopter itself.
Evacuation: talk to Kovalsky
You need to talk to Kovalsky before the evacuation starts.
Evacuation: tell Kovalsky you are ready
Should inform Kowalski mastered the readiness to start the evacuation.
Evacuation: wait for the emission to finish
You need to wait for the emission to finish.
Unknown: investigate the source of the signal
Kirillov has identified a strange signal not far from the base. You need to investigate the source of the signal.
Unknown: follow the signal
Coordinates signal again available, it is necessary for them to follow.
Unknown: investigate the last known signal location
Signal disappeared in the courtyard of the building, should be evaluated place last occurrence of the signal.
Unknown: prepare for the attack on the base
Return to the army base, and prepare for the likelihood of an attack.
Radio interference: talk to Kovalsky
Colonel Kowalski asked to come to him, you need to talk to him.
Laboratory X8: get inside the elevator shaft
Under the building of the CCD 'Jubilee' is the entrance to the underground laboratory, get Tudu is possible only through the elevator shaft.
Laboratory X8: find the generator
The power to the elevator shaft doors has been cut. Opening them will require you to find and activate the emergency generator.
Laboratory X8: descend into the laboratory
You need to use the elevator to get into laboratory X8, which is below the Yubileiny service center.
One shot: eliminate the messenger
It is necessary to eliminate the messenger. Without it, the mercenaries will not be able to detect the lab.
One shot: wait for the client's people
It is necessary to wait for the people of the customer, and to eliminate their leader. Without it, the mercenaries will not be able to detect the lab.
One shot: kill the mercenary squad leader
It is necessary to eliminate the leader of the mercenaries. Without it, the mercenaries will be disorganized and will not pose a threat.
One shot: wait for the mercenaries to appear
We must wait for the appearance of mercenaries, and to eliminate their leader. Without it, the mercenaries will be disorganized and will not pose a threat.
One shot: talk to Kovalsky
Report the mission results to Kovalsky.
Laboratory X8: leave the underground complex or continue looking for documents
You have found documents and you can now leave the laboratory, however there may still be other documents inside the complex.
Laboratory X8: leave the underground complex or continue looking for documents
You have found documents and you can now leave the laboratory, however there may still be other documents inside the complex.
Laboratory X8: leave the underground complex
It looks like you have collected all the documents in the laboratory. You can now leave the underground complex.
Monolith forces: wait for reinforcements
You need to wait for reinforcements sent by Kovalsky to eliminate the Monolith forces in the book store
A quiet word: talk to Kovalsky
You need to talk to Kovalsky. It looks like hes got something important to say.
Evacuation: hold out by the helicopters
You must protect the helicopters from the enemy until they can take off.
Evacuation: revive the medic
It seems the medic has been hit by unidentified forces again. Revive him as quickly as possible.
Evacuation: return to the helicopters
You must return to the helicopters as they might be able to take off any moment now.
Evacuation: return to the helicopters ASAP
The helicopters are ready for take-off. You must board one of them immediately - the pilots cannot wait long.
